languages.text: Простор Коронус — малоизученная область за пределами Империума, которая с незапамятных времен привлекает все новых искателей славы, сокровищ... и темных тайн, покоящихся во мраке между местными звездами.

traits.locale_text: Простор Коронус — малоизученная область за пределами Империума, которая с незапамятных времен привлекает все новых искателей славы, сокровищ... и темных тайн, покоящихся во мраке между местными звездами.

languages.text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.
languages.original_text: Простор Коронус — малоизученная область за пределами Империума, которая с незапамятных времен привлекает все новых искателей славы, сокровищ... и темных тайн, покоящихся во мраке между местными звездами.

traits.locale_text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.

The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.

languages.text: Les Étendues de Koronus sont une région méconnue au-delà des frontières de l'Imperium. Elles attirent depuis la nuit des temps toutes sortes d'individus en quête de gloire, de trésors... et des secrets ténébreux qui sommeillent dans la nuit interstellaire.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.

traits.locale_text: Les Étendues de Koronus constituent une région mal connue au-delà des frontières de l'Imperium. Elles attirent depuis la nuit des temps les individus en quête de gloire, de trésors... et des secrets ténébreux qui sommeillent dans la nuit interstellaire.

languages.text: La Extensión de Koronus es una región poco explorada más allá de los límites del Imperium. Desde antes de que se escribieran los primeros registros, la gente se ha visto atraída hasta aquí en busca de gloria, tesoros... y los siniestros secretos que yacen en la negrura entre las estrellas.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.

traits.locale_text: La Extensión de Koronus es una región poco explorada más allá de los límites del Imperium. Desde antes de que se escribieran los primeros registros, la gente se ha visto atraída hasta aquí en busca de gloria, tesoros... y los siniestros secretos que yacen en la negrura entre las estrellas.

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスは、帝国の末端にある、あまり調査の及んでいない宙域だ。記録が始まる以前から、人々は栄光と財宝を…そして星々の間の暗がりに眠る暗い秘密を求めて、この地に引き寄せられてきた。
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスは、帝国の末端にある、あまり調査の及んでいない宙域だ。記録が始まる以前から、人々は栄光と財宝を…そして星々の間の暗がりに眠る暗い秘密を求めて、この地に引き寄せられてきた。

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区是帝国边缘之外鲜有人踏足的地区。自从帝国国史记载以来，许多人被吸引到了那片扩区，寻求荣耀与宝藏……以及埋藏在群星之间黑暗而邪恶的秘密。
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区是帝国边缘之外鲜有人踏足的地区。自从帝国国史记载以来，许多人被吸引到了那片扩区，寻求荣耀与宝藏……以及埋藏在群星之间黑暗而邪恶的秘密。

languages.text: Die Koronus-Ausdehnung ist eine weitgehend unerforschte Region jenseits der Grenzen des Imperiums. Bereits vor dem Beginn der Aufzeichnungen haben die Aussicht auf Ruhm und Reichtum zahllose Glücksritter angelockt ... und die dunklen Geheimnisse, die zwischen den Sternen schlummern.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.

traits.locale_text: Die Koronus-Ausdehnung ist eine weitgehend unerforschte Region jenseits der Grenzen des Imperiums. Bereits vor dem Beginn der Aufzeichnungen haben die Aussicht auf Ruhm und Reichtum zahllose Glücksritter angelockt ... und die dunklen Geheimnisse, die zwischen den Sternen schlummern.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği, İmparatorluk'un uç sınırlarında bulunan ve keşif açısından bakir denilebilecek bir bölgedir. Kayıtların başlamasından bu yana insanlar, zafer ve hazine için oraya çekilirler... Bir de yıldızlar arasındaki kasvette uyuyan karanlık sırlar için elbette.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse is a little-studied region beyond the edges of the Imperium. Since before records began, people have been drawn there in search of glory, treasure... and the dark secrets that slumber in the gloom between the stars.
